resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3071</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3071</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Literatura. Històries</string>
            <string language="en">Literature. Stories</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literatur. Geschichten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Littérature. Histoires</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Literatura. Histórias</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Letteratura. Storia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λογοτεχνία. Ιστορίες</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Recurs interactiu que tracta de la novel·la catalana i universal, dels seus orígens i classes. S'hi estudien els principals gèneres: novel·la històrica, d'aventures, de terror, policíaca, d'enigma, negra, etc. Textos de: Manuel de Pedrolo, Charles Dickens, Andreu Martín, Narcís Oller i Robert Stevenson. Activitats d'autoavaluació per a la pràctica dels continguts de la unitat.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive resource on the Catalan novel, and novels generally, and the different main genres: historical, adventure, horror, detective, mystery, crime, etc. Sample texts by Manuel de Pedrolo, Charles Dickens, Andreu Martín, Narcís Oller and Robert Stevenson. Self-assessment activities are also included for practice.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gènere literari</string>
            <string language="en">literary genre</string>
            <string language="es">género literario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">literatura</string>
            <string language="en">literature</string>
            <string language="es">literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">narració</string>
            <string language="en">narration</string>
            <string language="es">narración</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktives Hilfsmittel auf dem katalanischen 
Roman und Romane im Allgemeinen und die unterschiedlichen Hauptgenren:
historisch, Abenteuer, Grausigkeit, Detektiv, Geheimnis, 
Verbrechen, usw.. Beispieltexte durch Manuel de Pedrolo, Charles
Dickens, Andreu Martín, Narcís Oller und Robert Stevenson. 
Selbstbewertung Aktivitäten sind auch für Praxis 
eingeschlossen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource interactive sur le roman catalan, et 
romans généralement, et les différents genres principaux : 
historique, aventure, horreur, détective, mystère, crime, 
etc... Textes témoin par Manuel de Pedrolo, Charles Dickens, 
Andreu Martín, Narcís Oller et Robert Stevenson. Des 
activités de art de l'auto-portrait-assessment sont également incluses pour la 
pratique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso interativo na novela catalan, e novelas 
geralmente, e os genres principais diferentes: histórico, 
aventura, horror, detetive, mistério, crime, etc.. Textos da 
amostra por Manuel de Pedrolo, por Charles Dickens, por Andreu 
Martín, por Narcís Oller e por Robert Stevenson. As atividades
do self-assessment são incluídas também para a prática.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa interattiva sul romanzo catalan e romanzi 
generalmente ed i generi principali differenti: storico, 
avventura, orrore, detectivo, mistero, crimine, ecc. Testi del 
campione da Manuel de Pedrolo, da Charles Dickens, da Andreu Martín, 
da Narcís Oller e da Robert Stevenson. Le attività di 
valutazione di se stesso egualmente sono incluse per pratica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικό στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς στο καταλανικό 
μυθιστόρημα, και μυθιστορήματα γενικά, και τα διαφορετικά βασικά 
ύφη: ιστορικός, περιπέτεια, φρίκη, ιδιωτικός αστυνομικός, 
μυστήριο, έγκλημα, κείμενα δείγματα κ.λπ. από Manuel de 
Pedrolo, Charles Dickens, Andreu Martνn, Narcνs 
Oller και Robert Stevenson. Οι δραστηριότητες 
αυτοαξιολόγησης συμπεριλαμβάνονται επίσης για την πρακτική.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">literarisches Genre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erzählung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">genre littéraire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">littérature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">récit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">genre literário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">narration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">genere letterario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">letteratura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">narration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λογοτεχνικό ύφος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λογοτεχνία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αφήγηση</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
